value.0:
DESCRIPTION:
greenish or yellow in color and known for its reflectiv light effect. it belong to the harder category of gems and are a favourit among jewellers
LORE:
called the "springtime stone" among druids or "youth stone" among humans it is widely belived to keep aging back aswell as to promote growth.
many are the bards that sing of how these gems are found under fallen trees of the wild
It is also said that Chrysoberyl has ties to the outer planes and hence its use with battling demonic possession and the undead.
